description_carte: Swift as the wind, strikes with deadly precision and unmatched agility.
description_visuelle: A slender knight wearing light green armor that appears almost weightless. Streamers of wind trail from the armor. Wields twin curved daggers.

skills.name: Gust Strike
skills.description: A quick attack that deals damage and increases own speed.

skills.name: Wind Barrier
skills.description: Creates a barrier that absorbs a portion of incoming damage.

skills.name: Whirlwind Assault
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of attacks, hitting multiple times.

skills.name: Zephyr's Fury
skills.description: A devastating attack that deals massive damage, fueled by wind magic.

skills.name: Agile Evade
skills.description: Increases evasion chance for a short duration
